location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.41 of 1825 (Political Department) to William Newnham, Chief Secretary, Government of Bombay, from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

physicalDescription.extent: The letter has been struck through in blue pencil.

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter, the original of which enclosed an extract of a letter from Mirza Ali Ackbar, the British Agent at Shiraz, giving details of a meeting that took place between the Viscount Desbassayns and the Government at Shiraz.
